screen.tilefinder.title: Tile Finder
tilefinder.gui.title: TileFinder
tilefinder.gui.group.name: Name
tilefinder.gui.sort.name: Name
tilefinder.configuration.helixRadius.too: Controls the radius of the double helix effect around the beam
tilefinder.configuration.helixSpeed.tool: Controls how fast the helix rotates over time
tilefinder.configuration.arcScale.toolti: Controls the height of the arc in the beam path
tilefinder.configuration.enableBeam.tool: Enable or disable the visual beam effect
Red component (0-255) of the first helix strand color
tilefinder.configuration.helixColor1Gree: Green component (0-255) of the first helix strand color
tilefinder.configuration.helixColor1Blue: Blue component (0-255) of the first helix strand color
Red component (0-255) of the second helix strand color
tilefinder.configuration.helixColor2Gree: Green component (0-255) of the second helix strand color
tilefinder.configuration.helixColor2Blue: Blue component (0-255) of the second helix strand color
tilefinder.configuration.defaultRadius.t: Default radius for searching tile entities when opening the GUI
tilefinder.configuration.favorites.toolt: List of favorite tile entity IDs that will be highlighted in the GUI
